fields.summary: WebHdfs logging is missing on Datanode

components.name: webhdfs
components.description: WebHDFS: HTTP REST API for HDFS

fields.description: Due to HDFS-7279, starting in 2.7.0, the DataNode HTTP Request logs no longer include WebHDFS requests because the HTTP request logging is done internal to {{HttpServer2}}, which is no longer used (replaced by Netty). This was fixed in HDFS-7959 but not added to branch-2.7 where the original breakage occurs.
fields.summary: Backport [HDFS-7959] to branch-2.7 to re-enable HTTP request logging for WebHDFS

comments.body: Thanks for the pointer [~kihwal]! I looked for {{LoggingHandler}} to be added in trunk but didn't consider that another method may have been used to achieve the same effect. Apologies for the dup. I am going to repurpose this JIRA for a backport to branch-2.7 given that this is a bug fix.
Attached v000 patch with backport; clean overall. Conflicts due to the changes to use the DefaultHttpResponse field instead of local variable but doesn't look like any logic conflicts.
